Part of Sheffield City Council's Communities section. A 5-bed unit for adults with learning disabilities aged 18-65 offering respite only. Maximum stay usually 2 weeks. This home is inspected by the Care Quality Commission to ensure a quality service is delivered.
Also provides an opportunity for people with learning disabilies to take part in activities away from their own home both on a one-to-one basis or as part of a group.
Can give advice and information on Direct Payments and provide help with managing money (but not payrolls).
